#summary jsCore Kind property.
#labels Phase-Implementation

*syntax:*
{{{
object.Kind ' [Number]
}}}

This have a only JSON_OBJECT or JSON_ARRAY values. If a defined with jsObject() function, have a JSON_OBJECT. If a defined with jsArray() function, have a JSON_ARRAY. 

== Samples ==
Convert to jsObject from jsArray fastly.
{{{
<!--#include file="JSON_latest.asp"-->
<%
Dim n
Set n = jsObject()

n("is1") = "cin"
n("is2") = "ali"
n("is3") = 55

n.Flush
n.Kind = JSON_ARRAY
n.Flush

%>
}}}
